name: number_of_plantations_in_swiss_forest
title: Number of plantations in Swiss forest
title_en: Number of plantations in Swiss forest
description: This dataset presents annual number of plantations in Swiss forest by forest zone (Jura, Central Plain, Prealps, Alps, Southern Alps), canton, type of owner (public forest, private forest) and wood species (hardwood, softwood), since 1975.
description_en: This dataset presents annual number of plantations in Swiss forest by forest zone (Jura, Central Plain, Prealps, Alps, Southern Alps), canton, type of owner (public forest, private forest) and wood species (hardwood, softwood), since 1975.
